referenceObject.reference: Diniz, V. S., Braga-Pereira, G. F. & Santos, A. J. (2022). Just met and already threatened? A new species of Paratrechalea Carico, 2005 from the Brazilian Cerrado (Araneae: Trechaleidae), with new distribution records for the genus. Arachnology 19(Special Issue): 348-357.
